alert.note: Alert for Hitchcock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 18 at 2:07PM CST until January 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...For the first Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ this afternoon to 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Friday. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ Friday to 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
